Inside the La Boqueria Mercat, you will find this small tapas bar with delicious food.  It is pretty basic and simple to what they serve.  I loved the fresh grilled shrimp and chick peas.  For breakfast, make sure you try the Xuxo.  It is this custard filled pastry that is deep fried and coated with sugar.  Make sure to get here early to try it because it sells out.  Service could be better, but they are pretty quick.  Just have to fight for a spot at the bar with limited seating.  Always busy.  Breakfast and lunch.  They do have a few tables with table service if you have a bigger group.  We met nice Spaniards here eating alone and guided us through the menu basically.  It was a fun experience.
